title: Get over hump day with these 3 TV picks
text:
Get over hump day with these 3 TV picks

Cape Town – Get over the hump with our top 3 TV picks for Wednesday night.

From exploring relationships, to a new legal series, to a movie based on the true story of a wrongly convicted thief.

Makoti

19:30 - SABC1 (DStv 191)

The series explores the reasons behind why people choose to get married, op to separate or get divorced. Each couple in the series undergoes a journey that reveals lessons about communication, assumption and expectations.

A couple that prays together stays together…but will it be the case with Zandile & Siyabonga as Noncedo continues to drive a wedge between them? Mthoko & Lilitha don’t see eye-to-eye about their future as a family, while Mo finds himself in some trouble and seeks Jessica’s help. pic.twitter.com/suuWAm9QGt — Makoti_SABC1 (@MakotiSabc1) October 9, 2019

All Rise

20:30 - 1Magic (DStv 103)

The new legal series takes a look into the personal and professional lives of the judges, lawyers, clerks, bailiffs and cops who work at an L.A. County courthouse. Newly-appointed Judge Lola Carmichael works to get justice for people amidst a flawed legal process.

Papillon

Showmax

Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charrière forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island. (Read our review here)
